data.title: Pottsville, PA
data.text:
The M&J Big Band is a 18-piece big band that was founded in 2010 to provide musical listeners with the great big band and jazz hits in Eastern Pennsylvania. Proudly led by Bandleader John Shoener, we continually strive for musical excellence in all that we do.

We strive to carry on the tradition of the great big bands of the swing era, as well as many other styles and artists, into the 21st century and beyond!

We welcome you to our website, and we hope that you will join us at one of our next performances!

John P. Shoener

Bandleader- M&J Big Band
